div.l: Til we bien Roten · can we nat be Ripe
We hope alway · while the world wil pipe
For in oure wil · ther stikith eủer a naile
To have an hore her · and a grene taile
As hath a leeke · for though oure myght be gon
Oure wil desirith folie · eủer in oon
For whan we may nat don · than wil we speke
Yit in oure asshen · old fuyre is I reke
Foure gleedis han we · whiche I shal devise
Avauntyng lyeng · anger and couetise
These foure sparcles · longen vnto eld
Oure lymes mawe wele bien vnweld
But wil ne shalt nat faile · this is soth
And yit I have alwey · a coltes toth
As many yeeris · as it is passed henne
Sith that my tappe of lif bigan to renne
For sikerly · whan I was bore anon
Deth driew the tappe · of lif and lete it gon
And eủer sith · hath the tappe so I Ronne
That almost · empty is the tonne
The streame of lyf · now droppith on the chymbe
The cely tunge · may wele Ryng and chymbe
Of wrecchidnesse · that passed is ful yore
With old folk · save dotage ther is nomore
Whan that oure host had herd this ʆsermonyng
He gan to speke as lordly · as a kyng
He saide what amountith al this wit
What shal we speke alday · of holy writ
The devil made a Ryve for to preche
